scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long grey beard and a halo is depicted in profile, wearing a pink robe and a blue and gold headdress. He is seated and appears to be reading from a large, open book, holding a stylus or quill in his right hand. The background suggests an indoor setting with a window showing a blue sky. The scene is likely a representation of a prophet or a scholar engaged in study or contemplation.
